WorkItem.Description:
Hi ,
 
i want to import into an excel 2 other excels each separately in a sheet.
 
Like in the 05featuredemo.inc.php example -  include "05featuredemo.inc.php";
 
I made separately seets and import on each, but it does not work , even if i try to import on the same sheet the 2 .
 
 
 
Please give me an example of doing this ,
 
 
 
Thanks Tibi

Comments.Message: Did you name the sheets differently, if I'm not misstaken sheetnames should be unique. Do you open existing excelsheets to merge as one or do you build them from scratch?
This is not an issue.... issues should be identified bugs in the PHPExcel code, or requests for new features in the library.

yes they are named differently i build them frn scratch i include 2 php files that generate the excel,  

I want each generated excel to be placed in the same excel file but on separates sheets
